titles.title: A bill to continue the temporary suspension of duties on 4-chloro-3-methylphenol.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/28/1988--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1990, the suspension of duty on 4-chloro-3-methylphenol.
